======Sets alien melee attack/touch to ignite marine or gets explosion effect.======
= Description =

== Boomer ==
======asw_boomer_ignite======
Controls boomer melee attack / touch will cause marine body on fire, set 1=melee, 2=touch, 3=All.
{|
|| [[asw_version.wiki|Server Version]] Added || Default || [[CvarFlags.wiki | CvarFlags]] || [ParamType Parameter Type] 
|-
|| 2.0 || `0` || [[FCVAR_CHEAT.wiki|FCVAR_CHEAT]] || [Int] 
|}

======asw_boomer_explode======
Controls boomer melee attack / touch will cause marine on explosion effect, set 1=melee, 2=touch, 3=All. Requires 'asw_boomer_touch_damage' > 0 to work  
{|
|| [[asw_version.wiki|Server Version]] Added || Default || [[CvarFlags.wiki | CvarFlags]] || [ParamType Parameter Type] 
|-
|| 2.0 || `0` || [[FCVAR_CHEAT.wiki|FCVAR_CHEAT]] || [Int] 
|}

======asw_boomer_touch_onfire======
Controls boomer on fire touch will cause marine body on fire.
{|
|| [[asw_version.wiki|Server Version]] Added || Default || [[CvarFlags.wiki | CvarFlags]] || [ParamType Parameter Type] 
|-
|| 2.0 || `0` || [[FCVAR_CHEAT.wiki|FCVAR_CHEAT]] || [Bool] 
|}
